expand.Title: delver's choice
expand.Text:
Delver's Choice is a fast-paced, simple and accessible, retro-styled dungeon crawler, that uses only four numeric keys and a simple RPG battle system

The player is constantly faced with randomly-generated challenges - having to make a choice is a small period of time is the point of the game.

Choices depend on your current stats, on the enemies' stats and the items in the environment. Will you be able to reach the hardest rooms of the dungeon?

Originally developed for Global Game Jam 2015. Currently being developed further as a FOSS game.
